摳.definition: to dig; to pick; to scratch (with a finger or sth pointed); to carve; to cut; to study meticulously; stingy; miserly; to lift up (esp. the hem of a robe)

摳圖.definition: (image processing) to extract a foreground object from its background; image matting

摳字眼.definition: to be fastidious about phrasing, diction, or choice of words

摳字眼兒.definition: erhua variant of 摳字眼|抠字眼[kou1 zi4 yan3]

摳腳.definition: to scratch one's foot; (fig.) to be stingy; (slang) (of a celebrity) to twiddle one's thumbs (i.e. not release any new material etc)

摳門兒.definition: erhua variant of 摳門|抠门[kou1 men2]
